articles.title: With 236th Test scalp, Roach moves past Sobers on Windies all-time list
articles.description: Kemar Roach moved past Gary Sobers to become West Indies' seventh most prolific wicket-taker when he claimed the prized scalp of Joe Root during the second Test on his home ground in Barbados on Thursday.
